name: Deadly Threat (itch)
description:
Deadly Threat is an action-adventure game with RPG and first-person shooter (FPS) elements. You have to control the hero and explore mysterious locations in the dungeon.

You have to go through a dangerous dungeon and fight various monsters and bosses alone. Use powerful weapons to fight back the Ancient Lich who is ready to destroy your world. Recently, he got out to freedom and is ready to raise an army of the dead to destroy everything in his path. And only you can stop it.
